transcript:
So I've been using Coursiv.io for a while now, 
and this video is my honest and unbiased review  
on Coursiv.io. I'll cover all the main points, 
from key features to risks and considerations.  
So by the end of this video, you'll have 
a better understanding of Coursiv.io. 
What is Coursiv.io? So, what exactly is 
Coursiv.io? At its core, It positions itself  
as an innovative platform offering training in 
freelancing, with a focus on AI-driven learning.  
The program promises to teach you how to land gigs 
on platforms like Upwork and Fiverr, claiming you  
can earn up to “$250 a day” using AI-generated 
images. But here’s the thing—many users find the  
content basic, and the earning potential feels 
overly hyped; Most of what you learn here can  
be found for free with a bit of research online.
Pricing and Billing: When it comes to pricing,  
Coursiv offers a low entry price, 
starting at just $10 for a trial week,  
which seems great if you just want to test the 
waters. However, the prices jump quickly with  
recurring charges that can be confusing and often 
higher than expected. Customer feedback frequently  
mentions unauthorized charges and a lack of 
response when seeking refunds, making it clear  
that billing issues are a recurring problem.
Content and Features: If you're a complete  
beginner, Coursiv can help you familiarize 
with basic freelancing concepts and provide  
24-by-7 access to an AI assistant. But don’t 
expect deep, cutting-edge insights—you’ll get  
surface-level guidance at its best. The AI bot 
is mostly useful for answering simple questions,  
which may not be enough for those looking 
to stand out in a competitive market. 
Content Quality: But let's be real. It's not 
all sunshine and rainbows; there are some cons  
to consider. For instance, a lot of users have 
reported feeling let-down by the content quality,  
labeling it as unremarkable and often outdated. 
So, If you’re expecting to gain advanced skills,  
you might want to keep your expectations in check.
Conclusion: Overall, Coursiv.io is a solid choice,  
If you’re just starting and want a 
low-commitment intro to freelancing. Well,  
that's all for this video. I hope you found 
this video helpful. And if you did, make sure  
you give this video a super thanks by clicking 
on the heart icon to help support the channel,  
and don't forget to hit that subscribe 
button. Will see you in the next one.
